subject: Golf
British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Johnson, 39, won his second major title, surviving a four-hole playoff with Louis Oosthuizen and Marc Leishman and denying Spieth the third leg of the Grand Slam.
snippet: Johnson, 39, won his second major title, surviving a four-hole playoff with Louis Oosthuizen and Marc Leishman and denying Spieth the third leg of the Grand Slam.
